content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
thought: I need to move a rabbit_hide to the crafting grid, and I can start in the top left slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
thought: I need to move a rabbit_hide to the crafting grid, and I can move it to the right of the previous one.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
thought: I need to move a rabbit_hide to the crafting grid, and I can move it below the previous one.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
thought: I need to move a rabbit_hide to the crafting grid, and I can move it to the right of the previous one.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I can craft the leather by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
